name: Kitchen by tom howley
description: Archived kitchen model from the studio Tom Howley Renders with high quality you can see here: https://www.behance.net/gallery/76970137/Kitchen-by-Tom-Howley Export File: Fbx ====================================== The file also contains 2 models of Miele: 1 - Miele Combi Steamer (DGC 6865) 2 - Miele Coffee Machine (CVA 6800) The file does not include: floor, ceiling, wall. ====================================== The kitchen is assembled as carefully as possible, if desired, you can easily change it for your project. All textures and models in high quality are perfect for rendering from a close perspective. ====================================== Units in millimeters. No third-party plugin or script required. ====================================== Who works in the V-Ray version is lower than 3.1. Be careful, in the materials in the BRDF section there is a Microfaset GTR (GGX), if your version is older than 3.1, then the BRDF field will be empty. Choose Blinn, Phong or Ward - which is preferable to you. For Corona render, it is recommended to install a version not lower than 1.5, since the glossiness of materials is customized taking into account PBR Enjoy using and beautiful renders! Show more
short_description:
Platform:	 3dsMax 2013 + fbx
Render:	 Vray+Corona
Size:	 21 MB
Style:	 Classic
Materials:	 Wood, Stone
